QuestData.Title: Eyes on the Problem
QuestData.Description:
Our enemies rally at our gates. We cannot rely on daring air strikes to hold them at bay.
Vashj has a plan to permanently bolster our defenses. With your help, it might actually succeed.
Do what you can to assist her. She seems more... agreeable toward you than she is with me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Vashj and put her plan into action.
QuestData.RewardText: Our foes will regret opposing us.
